wikipedia_page.main: Robin McCallum (previously Robin Lermitte; born 1961) is a British actor and weather presenter.

response: In the BBC drama Oscar (1985) he was portrayed by Robin Lermitte (credited as Robin McCallum); Michael Gambon played Wilde.
* Robin McCallum (21st century), British weather presenter
Actress Anna Wilson-Jones portrayed Lady Emma Portman in the first three seasons of ITV period drama Victoria. Recurring in series 1 and main in series 2 and 3, with Robin McCallum as Lord Portman.
